name: OverParented
description:
OVERPARENTED!

Entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2021 - Theme: Stronger Together

This is a quick, 5 minute playtime experience, just 3 levels long.  Play as 2 parents who are in no way, shape or form based on a game dev  who decided it was a good idea to take on a game jam with a newborn baby. Control him and his wife both simultaneously in this shameless rip off of Overcooked, except you control both people at the same time, because you are STRONGER TOGETHER!  I suppose you can play it local multiplayer as well...but where's the fun in that?

**Web port stinks, sorry! If Controls aren't working, try refreshing the page!
